page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT in Withington 2
page.content: on a{casual basis}during the busy periods. Halmans Nurseries is a family run general nursery run with the help of casual labour in the season. The Red Lion{public house}has recently had a new manager and employs several people. The{Village Hall employs 1 person. Most people who live in the Lower Withington area{travel away}from the village to work some to such places as Wilmslow, Macclesfield, Congleton, Sandbach, Northwich or Knutsford whilst others go{further afield}to Manchester, Liverpool or the Potteries. The close proximity of the motorway network, stations on the main London to Manchester railway and Manchester International Airport means that those who need to travel in the course of their work find this area a convenient place in which to live.
